price: 3. How many a generation have We destroyed before them! And they cried out when there was no longer time for escape.
arabic: كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن قَرۡنٖ فَنَادَواْ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٖ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: kam ahlaknā min qablihim min qarnin fanādaw walāta ḥīna manāṣin
